title: Two 4 card raw lots - including Rossman run
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Two 4 card raw lots - including Rossman run
posts.post_content:
Three separate four card lots as follows.  Prices include delivery.

Lot 1 - asking $40 delivered - SALE PENDING
GANZEL, mccormick, hartsel, taylor

Lot 2 - asking $50 delivered - SOLD
ames, HALL, BURCH, DONOHUE

Lot 3 - asking $100 delivered
back run of Claude Rossman
